content: scrappy hat is everyone s favourite style to use up left over odds and ends of yarn different every time carefully select coordinating yarns or grab colours at random and see what happens worked holding two strands together as one scrap of yarn runs out add another and carry on you will need 70-100g of scraps of yarn make give live is a new zealand based social enterprise we have community knitting groups that aim to ease isolation improve well being and spread the benefits of community crafting far and wide we are a growing movement spreading the benefits of crafting with a purpose for more information visit our website http //makegivelive com/
